Katra Home

Our New Look

29 August 2013

I've redisigned the site, so that it is now split between Git Hub pages and OpenShift.

The static content, such as this blog, is created using Jekyll and published to github.

Katra has also been converted to static pages. All of the dynamic content is now generated on the client using jQuery and AJAX.

Other dynamic content has been moved to OpenShift:

  • Exspresso Coffeescript Web Framework.
  • CDN Dark Overlord of Data assets in a browsable cdn.
